title: Doll Syndrome (2014)
overview: a soldier try to start a new life and a new job after a nightmarish experience during the war. he fall in love for a young girl that meet everyday in a bar, without talk, and everything goes fine till he discovers that she have a boyfriend.
storyline: An obsessed, homicidal loner stalks women in a metropolitan city in hopes of creating the ultimate living doll that he can keep all for himself.
